mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodCnncGrpGod Generator(Generator) 2019-10-10 */ ERP_GOD_CNNC_GRP_NO , GOD_NO , MALL_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_CNNC_GRP_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND ERP_GOD_CNNC_GRP_NO = #{erpGodCnncGrpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ERP_GOD_NO = #{erpGodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
